meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

editorialNote.content: The title of this Regulation was amended from “Insurance Companies (Register of Insurers) (Prescribed Fee) Regulations” to “Insurance (Prescribed Fees) Regulation” — see L.N. 57 of 2017.

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Regulation may be cited as the Insurance (Prescribed Fees) Regulation.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Fees
section.leadIn: A fee set out in column 4 of the Schedule must be paid to the Authority—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: for a fee for obtaining a document or copy of a document—when the request for obtaining the document or copy is made;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: for a fee for an application, notification, request or submission—when the application, notification, request or submission is made; or (L.N. 55 of 2024)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: for a fee for anything done by the Authority, in performing its function under section 4A(1) of the Ordinance in relation to a petition under section 24(1) of the Ordinance—when a copy of the petition is served on the Authority under section 24(3)(c) of the Ordinance.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Waiver of fees
section.leadIn: If, in relation to any person or class of persons, the Authority is of the opinion that the payment of any fee set out in items 7BA to 7BZF of Part 1 of the Schedule would be unduly burdensome or inappropriate, the Authority may—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: waive, in whole or in part, the payment of the fee; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: refund, in whole or in part, the fee paid.

section.name: s1
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: licence (牌照) has the meaning given by section 64F of the Ordinance;
linked long term business (相連長期業務) means insurance business of the nature specified in class C in Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the Ordinance.

td.p:
Matter in respect of
which fee must be paid
For obtaining each page of a copy of an entry in, or extract of, the register of authorized insurers
For obtaining a copy of an entry in, or extract of, the register of authorized insurers, certified by an authorized officer of the Authority as a true copy of the entry or extract
For each application for approval of the appointment of a controller
For each application for approval of the appointment of a director
For each application for approval of the appointment of a key person in control functions
For each application for approval for a person to be—
For each application for approval of the appointment of an actuary
For obtaining each page of a copy of an entry in, or extract of, the register of licensed insurance intermediaries
For obtaining a copy of an entry in, or extract of, the register of licensed insurance intermediaries, certified by an authorized officer of the Authority as a true copy of the entry or extract
For each notification of an intended appointment of an agent

For each application for approval to vary lines of business specified in the licence of a licensed insurance agency by adding general business or long term business (excluding linked long term business), and the application is made—
at least 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
at least 1 year but less than 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
less than 1 year immediately before the expiry of the licence

For each application for approval to vary lines of business specified in the licence of a licensed insurance agency by changing long term business (excluding linked long term business) to long term business (including linked long term business), and the application is made—
at least 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
at least 1 year but less than 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
less than 1 year immediately before the expiry of the licence

For each application for approval to vary lines of business specified in the licence of a licensed insurance agency (in which long term business (excluding linked long term business) is not specified) by adding long term business (including linked long term business), and the application is made—
at least 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
at least 1 year but less than 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
less than 1 year immediately before the expiry of the licence

For each application for approval to vary lines of business specified in the licence of a licensed individual insurance agent, a licensed technical representative (agent) or a licensed technical representative (broker) by adding general business or long term business (excluding linked long term business), and the application is made—
at least 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
at least 1 year but less than 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
less than 1 year immediately before the expiry of the licence

For each application for approval to vary lines of business specified in the licence of a licensed individual insurance agent, a licensed technical representative (agent) or a licensed technical representative (broker) by changing long term business (excluding linked long term business) to long term business (including linked long term business), and the application is made—
at least 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
at least 1 year but less than 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
less than 1 year immediately before the expiry of the licence

For each application for approval to vary lines of business specified in the licence of a licensed individual insurance agent, a licensed technical representative (agent) or a licensed technical representative (broker) (in which long term business (excluding linked long term business) is not specified) by adding long term business (including linked long term business), and the application is made—
at least 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
at least 1 year but less than 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
less than 1 year immediately before the expiry of the licence

For each application for approval to vary lines of business specified in the licence of a licensed insurance broker company by adding general business or long term business (excluding linked long term business), and the application is made—
at least 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
at least 1 year but less than 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
less than 1 year immediately before the expiry of the licence

For each application for approval to vary lines of business specified in the licence of a licensed insurance broker company by changing long term business (excluding linked long term business) to long term business (including linked long term business), and the application is made—
at least 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
at least 1 year but less than 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
less than 1 year immediately before the expiry of the licence

For each application for approval to vary lines of business specified in the licence of a licensed insurance broker company (in which long term business (excluding linked long term business) is not specified) by adding long term business (including linked long term business), and the application is made—
at least 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
at least 1 year but less than 2 years immediately before the expiry of the licence
less than 1 year immediately before the expiry of the licence
For each application for an insurance agency licence to carry on, as an agent of any authorized insurer, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a 3-year individual insurance agent licence to carry on, as an agent of any authorized insurer, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a 2-year individual insurance agent licence to carry on, as an agent of any authorized insurer, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a 1-year individual insurance agent licence to carry on, as an agent of any authorized insurer, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a 3-year technical representative (agent) licence to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance agency, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a 2-year technical representative (agent) licence to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance agency, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a 1-year technical representative (agent) licence to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance agency, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for an insurance broker company licence to carry on regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a 3-year technical representative (broker) licence to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance broker company, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a 2-year technical representative (broker) licence to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance broker company, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a 1-year technical representative (broker) licence to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance broker company, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)

For each application for approval of an individual as a responsible officer of a licensed insurance agency or of a person who applies under section 64U of the Ordinance for an insurance agency licence for regulated activities in—
any line of business other than restricted scope travel business

For each application for approval of an individual as a responsible officer of a licensed insurance broker company or of a company that applies under section 64ZA of the Ordinance for an insurance broker company licence
For each application for a renewal of the licence of a licensed insurance agency—
with more than 1 000 technical representatives (agent) appointed as its agent at the time of the renewal application
with at least 100 but not more than 1 000 technical representatives (agent) appointed as its agent at the time of the renewal application
with fewer than 100 technical representatives (agent) appointed as its agent at the time of the renewal application
For each application for a renewal of the licence of a licensed individual insurance agent for 3 years to carry on, as an agent of any authorized insurer, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a renewal of the licence of a licensed individual insurance agent for 2 years to carry on, as an agent of any authorized insurer, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a renewal of the licence of a licensed technical representative (agent) for 3 years to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance agency, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a renewal of the licence of a licensed technical representative (agent) for 2 years to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance agency, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for a renewal of the licence of a licensed insurance broker company—
with more than 1 000 technical representatives (broker) appointed as its agent at the time of the renewal application
with at least 100 but not more than 1 000 technical representatives (broker) appointed as its agent at the time of the renewal application
with fewer than 100 technical representatives (broker) appointed as its agent at the time of the renewal application

For each application for a renewal of the licence of a licensed technical representative (broker) for 3 years to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance broker company, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)

For each application for a renewal of the licence of a licensed technical representative (broker) for 2 years to carry on, as an agent of any licensed insurance broker company, regulated activities in—
long term business (excluding linked long term business)
long term business (including linked long term business)
general business and long term business (excluding linked long term business)
general business and long term business (including linked long term business)
For each application for an exemption from any provision of Part X of the Ordinance
For each application under section 95I(2) of the Ordinance for approval for a person to be—
a minority shareholder controller of a designated insurance holding company
a majority shareholder controller of a designated insurance holding company
For each application under section 95K(2) of the Ordinance for approval for a person to be—
a minority shareholder controller of a designated insurance holding company
a majority shareholder controller of a designated insurance holding company
For each application under section 95L(5) of the Ordinance for approval for a person to be—
a minority shareholder controller of a designated insurance holding company
a majority shareholder controller of a designated insurance holding company
For each application for approval of the appointment of a chief executive
For each application for approval of the appointment of a director
For each application for approval of the appointment of a key person in control functions
For each application for approval of a major acquisition
For each application for approval of an assessment framework for major acquisition
For each notification of the appointment of—
a controller (other than one to whom section 13A or 13B of the Ordinance applies) of an authorized insurer
a director (other than one to whom section 13AC of the Ordinance applies) of an authorized insurer
a key person in control functions (other than one to whom section 13AE of the Ordinance applies) of an authorized insurer
For each notification of the fact that a majority shareholder controller has become a minority shareholder controller that is given under section 13BB of the Ordinance
For each notification of the appointment of an auditor of an authorized insurer under section 15 of the Ordinance
For requesting the Authority to update the information in the register kept under section 5H(1) of the Ordinance
For obtaining a duplicate certificate of authorization of an authorized insurer from the Authority
For obtaining a certificate of compliance of an authorized insurer from the Authority
For requesting the Authority to waive the fee payable under section 13(1)(b) of the Ordinance
For requesting the Authority to accept other standards as being comparable to the prescribed standards for the purposes of section 15C of the Ordinance

For requesting the Authority to vary under section 17(2) of the Ordinance a prescribed requirement in relation to the submission of statements, reports or other information relating to an authorized insurer’s business
For requesting the Authority to vary under section 21A(2) of the Ordinance a prescribed requirement in relation to the disclosure of information relating to an authorized insurer’s state of affairs
For requesting the Authority to permit under section 22A(1) of the Ordinance a non-HK insurer to comply with section 21B(2) and (3), instead of section 21B(5) and (6), of the Ordinance

For anything done by the Authority, in performing its function under section 4A(1) of the Ordinance in relation to a petition under section 24(1) of the Ordinance served on it under section 24(3)(c) of the Ordinance (other than things in relation to which the court concerned may award costs to the Authority, for example, for costs relating to the engagement of external counsel or solicitors or both in relation to the petition)
For requesting the Authority to permit under section 25AAC(1) of the Ordinance a non-HK insurer to comply with section 25AA(2), instead of section 25AA(4), of the Ordinance
For requesting the Authority to approve the terms and conditions attached to a letter of credit or other commitment from a bank under section 25C(1) of the Ordinance
For each application to the Authority for approval of a transfer under section 25D(1) of the Ordinance

For requesting the Authority to waive under section 50C(10) of the Ordinance the fee payable in respect of the financial year to which an annual report mentioned in section 50C(9) of the Ordinance relates and any subsequent financial year
For requesting the Authority to disclose information to an auditor or actuary of an authorized insurer to the extent permitted by section 53A(3)(f) of the Ordinance
For each notification of the fact that a majority shareholder controller has become a minority shareholder controller that is given under section 95OA of the Ordinance
For requesting the Authority to give consent to a person other than a non-profit making entity for the purposes of section 120(1) or (3) of the Ordinance
For requesting the Authority to relax rules under section 130(1) of the Ordinance

For requesting the Authority to extend under rule 8 of the Insurance (Submission of Statements, Reports and Information) Rules (Cap. 41 sub. leg. S) the specified period referred to in rule 3(2), 4(1), (2), (3) or (4), 6(1) or 7(1) of those Rules

part.name: P2
part.heading: Fees Payable under Insurance (Valuation and Capital) Rules (Cap. 41 sub. leg. R)

td.p: Provision of Insurance (Valuation and Capital) Rules

Matter in respect of
which fee must be paid
For each application for approval to classify an equity as a strategic investment
For each application for approval to take into account the additional insurance risk mitigation effect of a contract of reinsurance in determining its risk capital amount for reserve and premium risk
For each application for approval to use an applicable insurer’s own assessment to determine the insurer’s risk capital amount for natural catastrophe risk
For each submission of information in relation to the use of the applicable insurer’s own assessment
For each application for approval to use an internal assessment process to map an exposure to an instrument or a party to the appropriate credit rating band
For each submission of information in relation to the use of the internal assessment process
